players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was killed on the first night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to figure out why he might have been targeted."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's all be vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior."
You: "Let's all just calm down and try to figure out what happened. We don't know anything about the killer yet, so let's not jump to conclusions."

Diana: "I think we should all consider the possibility that one of us is a mafioso and may be trying to manipulate our actions. Let's try to stay focused on the facts and not get distracted by speculation or fear."
